metadata.generation_method: Part-of-speech validated with i+1 comprehensible input methodology
metadata.notes: Complete regeneration with zero catastrophic errors. All adverbs properly validated.

hello.sentence: I say hello to my friend.

goodbye.sentence: I say goodbye to my mother.

thank you.sentence: I say thank you to her.

sorry.sentence: I am very sorry about that.

no.sentence: No, I do not want tea.

excuse me.sentence: Excuse me, where is the bank?
Excuse me, can you help me?

help.sentence: I help my friend with work.

week.sentence: I see my family every week.

today.sentence: I eat lunch today at home.

always.sentence: I always eat breakfast at home.

often.sentence: I often drink coffee in the morning.

here.sentence: Please sit here next to me.

family.sentence: I see my family every week.

mother.sentence: I call my mother every day.

father.sentence: I help my father with work.

child.sentence: I take my child to school.

friend.sentence: I eat lunch with my friend.

drink.sentence: Do you drink tea or coffee?

food.sentence: I buy food at the shop.

water.sentence: Can I have some water, please?

coffee.sentence: I want a cup of coffee.

house.sentence: I live in a small house.

shop.sentence: I buy food at the shop.

bus.sentence: I go to work by bus.

train.sentence: I go to the city by train.

car.sentence: I go to work by car.

phone.sentence: I call you on my phone.

book.sentence: I have many books at home.

big.sentence: I want a big coffee, please.

small.sentence: I live in a small city.

old.sentence: My father is sixty years old.

hard / difficult.sentence: The work is hard and difficult.
My job is hard but good.

one.sentence: I drink one coffee a day.

two.sentence: I drink two cups of coffee.
I work two days a week.

three.sentence: I eat three times a day.
I live on street number three.

give.sentence: I give my friend a book.

tell.sentence: I tell my friend the answer.

ask.sentence: I ask my mother a question.

call.sentence: I call my mother every day.

start.sentence: I start my new job tomorrow.

try.sentence: I try to find my phone.

buy.sentence: I buy food at the shop.
I buy a new shirt today.

wake up.sentence: I wake up and drink coffee.

get up.sentence: I get up and go to work.

afternoon.sentence: I eat lunch in the afternoon.

evening.sentence: I see my friends in the evening.

hour.sentence: I work eight hours a day.

minute.sentence: The bus comes in ten minutes.

same.sentence: We work at the same time.

left.sentence: The shop is on the left.

next.sentence: I live next to the bank.

problem.sentence: I have a problem at work.

word.sentence: I learn new words every day.

way.sentence: Can you show me the way?

part.sentence: I eat part of the bread.

some.sentence: Can I have some coffee, please?

because.sentence: I stay because I am tired.
I eat because I am hungry.
I walk because I have no car.

but.sentence: I like tea, but I drink coffee.
I want to go, but I am busy.

and.sentence: I eat bread and drink water.
